reviewText: Definitivamente para poder ver la pelicula debes leer el libro completo, para que no omitas detalles que son descritos en el. De las mejores historias de todos los tiempos.

I teach this novel in my Spanish class, therefore the students and I watch the movie after reading the book. To my surprise, the DVD was in bad condition and was sold as new. I would think twice before ordering from this seller.
This is a very good version of the original novel. It was a little dissapointing that some of the very best parts of the book were changed or cut in the movie.
